name: A.P. Møller - Mærsk A/S
bossPosition: Head of Public Affairs, Vice President
goal:
A.P. Moller - Maersk is an integrated container logistics company working to connect and simplify its customers’ supply chains. As the global leader in shipping services, the company operates in 130 countries and employs roughly 76,000 people.

In the fiscal year of 2017, Maersk reported a net revenue of USD 31 bn.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
- European Energy Policy
- European Climate Policy
- European Environmental Policy
- European Maritime Policy
- European Ports Policy
- European Logistics Policy
- European Transportation Policy
- European Customs Policy
- European Tax Policy
- European Competition Policy
- European Trade Policy
- European Company Law and Corporate Governance Policy
